00022     char* SimpleLayout::format(const LoggingEvent& event) {
00023         ostrstream message;
00024 
00025         const std::string& priorityName = Priority::getPriorityName(event.priority);
00026         message << priorityName << " - " << event.message << std::endl << '\0';
00027 
00028         return message.str();
00029     }
